1. Load and tidy the pups data.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)

pups_data = read_csv("./FAS_pups.csv", col_types = "ciiiii") %>%
  clean_names() %>%
  gather('pd_ears', 'pd_eyes', 'pd_pivot', 'pd_walk', key = "pd_outcome", value = "pd_days")
```
